''Other editions:'' [[Shareware]] | website = {{url|http://www.zonealarm.com/}} }} '''ZoneAlarm''' is a [[personal firewall]] software application originally developed by [[Zone Labs]], which was acquired in March 2004 by [[Check Point]].{{Cite web |url=http://www.checkpoint.com/press/2004/zlaquisition032904.html |title=Check Point acquires Zone Labs |date=2004-03-29 |archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/5zpeGiwv7 |archivedate=2011-06-30 }} It is chiefly notable for the "Global Virus Alert" [[scareware]] popup which ZoneAlarm used to try to get users to switch to their paid security suite.{{cite web|last=Leyden |first=John |url=http://www.theregister.co.uk/2010/09/20/zonealarm_scareware_flap/ |title=ZoneAlarm slammed for scarewarey marketing |publisher=Theregister.co.uk |date=2010-09-20 |accessdate=2010-11-09}} The popup was turned off by the ZoneAlarm marketing team after an uproar from disgruntled users, many of who uninstalled the software.{{cite web|last=Protalinski |first=Emil |url=http://arstechnica.com/security/news/2010/09/zonealarm-caught-using-fake-antivirus-scare-tactics.ars |title=ZoneAlarm caught using fake antivirus scare tactics |publisher=Arstechnica.com |date=2010-09-22 |accessdate=2010-11-09}}{{cite web|last=Pegoraro |first=Rob |url=http://voices.washingtonpost.com/fasterforward/2010/09/zonealarm_gives_people_a_new_r.html |title=ZoneAlarm gives people a new reason to hate security software |publisher=Voices.washingtonpost.com |date= |accessdate=2010-11-09}} ==Features== ZoneAlarm includes an inbound intrusion detection system, as well as the ability to control which programs can create outbound connections. {{As of|2011|alt=As of June 2011}}, the newest release is ''ZoneAlarm Extreme Security'' 2012. ZoneAlarm was formerly known as Zone Labs.{{cite web|url=http://www.zonealarm.com/store/content/company/aboutUs/pressroom/graphicResources.jsp?dc=34std&ctry=&lang=en |title=Graphic Resources: ZoneAlarm by Check Point |publisher=Zonealarm.com |date= |accessdate=2010-09-22}} ==Unauthorized web access== Even when all settings to automatically connect to the company's offices are turned off, ZoneAlarm Security Suite (the paid version of ZoneAlarm) will still send information over the internet.[http://www.infoworld.com/t/hardware/zonealarm-phones-home-apple-throws-intel-bone-143 ZoneAlarm phones home] [[InfoWorld]]. 13 Jan 2006. Last accessed 16 Nov 2011. Last accessed 16 Nov 201.
